dmca.title: Unauthorized use of my copyrighted images
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Mayes [mailto:manager@tm-photo.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 11, 2005 10:40 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; a_c_u_m@yahoo.com;
amy_independent_escort@yahoo.com
Subject: Unauthorized use of my copyrighted images

To:

Lance Crosby, Esq. at www.theplanet.com  and
Nicolae Beldea at www.escort-world.com
"AMY" the escort in question listed on the page with the images that are
being used without permission.

Hello,

It has come to my attention that a number of my images are being used
without my expressed permission on www.escort-world.com hosted by
www.theplanet.com

All of the 12 images on the page:
http://www.escort-world.info/amy/page1.htm  are images I shot a few years
ago of a model I call "Savannah".  I guarantee I have no record of sales of
any usage rights to those images to any webmaster that operates
http://www.escort-world.info/ .  I also didn't give or sell usage rights to
any "escort" named "Amy".

Please take those images down before I have to initiate legal action.

I would appreciate your quick compliance, as well as short note when the
images have been removed.

Thank you in advance,

Tom Mayes
http://www.tm-photo.com
manager@tm-photo.com
(510) 581-2600
(800) 249-9737
22129 Prospect St.
Hayward, CA 94541
